books.author: by Amy Schumer
books.description: Humorous personal essays by the comedian, actor and writer.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE LOWER BACK TATTOO

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood in the Rust Belt.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who campaigned for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Dick Morris and Eileen McGann
books.description: The political strategist offers a game plan for how to defeat Hillary Clinton.
books.name: ARMAGEDDON

books.author: by Andi Dorfman
books.description: A finalist on Season 18 of "The Bachelor," later the star of Season 10 of "The Bachelorette," talks about her experience.
books.name: IT'S NOT OKAY

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed; from the author of "Blink" and "The Tipping Point." Originally published in 2008.
books.name: OUTLIERS

books.author: by Chesley B. Sullenberger III with Jeffrey Zaslow
books.description: A memoir by the pilot who performed the successful emergency landing of a plane with 155 passengers on the Hudson River in 2009. The basis for the movie.
books.name: SULLY

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Nancy Isenberg
books.description: The white poor in American history.
books.name: WHITE TRASH

books.author: by Tom Wolfe
books.description: The novelist argues that, contrary to the theories of Noam Chomsky, there is no evolutionary explanation for language.
books.name: THE KINGDOM OF SPEECH

books.author: by Lin-Manuel Miranda and Jeremy McCarter
books.description: The libretto of the Grammy-, Tony- and Pulitzer Prize-winning musical, annotated by its creator, along with backstage photos and interviews with the cast.
books.name: HAMILTON: THE REVOLUTION

books.author: by Jeffrey Toobin
books.description: The story of Patty Hearst's kidnapping in 1974 by the Symbionese Liberation Army, her crimes and her trial.
books.name: AMERICAN HEIRESS
